Files in this folder is taken from: https://github.com/torvalds/linux/tree/master/include/uapi/drm
And should be used as is, without any modification.

Last Update:
commit b06103b5325364e0b9944024db41b400b9028df9
Merge tag 'amd-drm-next-5.17-2021-12-16' of https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/agd5f/linux into drm-next
Author: Alex Deucher <alexander.deucher@amd.com>
Date: Dec 23, 2021

amdgpu:
- Add some display debugfs entries
- RAS fixes
- SR-IOV fixes
- W=1 fixes
- Documentation fixes
- IH timestamp fix
- Misc power fixes
- IP discovery fixes
- Large driver documentation updates
- Multi-GPU memory use reductions
- Misc display fixes and cleanups
- Add new SMU debug option

amdkfd:
- SVM fixes

radeon:
- Fix typo in comment

From: Alex Deucher <alexander.deucher@amd.com>
